speaker: Terra
text: Sooo... a Dorid from Selaria. Very interesting.

speaker: Dizzy
text: You should run while you can! It’s not safe on here!

speaker: Gilly
text: Run? Why would I run? I’m riding for my desires-sake. To achieve my greatest hopes and dreams once deemed impossible. This place is safe. This is my new home.

speaker: Ashe
text: If you won’t step aside, I’m afraid we’ll have to do things the hard way.
